description: '''Sophisti-pop''' is a [[pop music]] subgenre that developed during the mid-1980s out of the British [[New wave music|new wave]] era. It originated with acts who blended elements of [[jazz]], [[soul music|soul]], and [[pop music|pop]] with lavish [[music production|production]]. The term "sophisti-pop" was coined only after the genre's peak in the mid-late 1980s.
